thread.title: Meet the ICON A5: A plane you can park in your driveway
thread.title_full: Meet the ICON A5: A plane you can park in your driveway

author: Special for USA TODAY
title: Meet the ICON A5: A plane you can park in your driveway
text: The ICON A5 is made to be so intuitive that nearly anyone can learn to fly it in less than 30 hours. A James Bond-style piece of machinery, it has sports-car style and maneuvers on water with the quickness of a jet ski. ICON Aircraft The ultra-fast learning curve is all thanks to the fact that the cockpit is non-intimidating and looks very much like a car’s dashboard. ICON Aircraft Fullscreen The ICON A5 is made to be so intuitive that nearly anyone can learn to fly it in less than 30 hours. A James Bond-style piece of machinery, it has sports-car style and maneuvers on water with the quickness of a jet ski. ICON Aircraft Fullscreen The ICON A5 is made to be so intuitive that nearly anyone can learn to fly it in less than 30 hours. A James Bond-style piece of machinery, it has sports-car style and maneuvers on water with the quickness of a jet ski. ICON Aircraft At the end of the day, you can fold the wings back, load it onto a trailer and park it in your driveway. ICON Aircraft Fullscreen The ICON A5 is made to be so intuitive that nearly anyone can learn to fly it in less than 30 hours. A James Bond-style piece of machinery, it has sports-car style and maneuvers on water with the quickness of a jet ski. ICON Aircraft With a range of about 430 miles on a full tank, it’s ideal for quick excursions. Better yet, you can land it nearly anywhere, including lakes, paved runways and grass.
